Body:
"""
    Check that Cosmology objects can only be constructed in a valid way.
    """
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7,
    A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, matter_power_spectrum='x')
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7,
    A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, transfer_function='x')
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7,
    A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, baryons_power_spectrum='x')
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7,
    A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, mass_function='x')
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7,
    A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, halo_concentration='x')
